mapper.select: SELECT q.`id`, q.`section_id`, q.`knowledge_id`, q.`specialty_id`, q.`questions_type`, q.`questions_content`, q.`select_A`, q.`select_B`, q.`select_C`, q.`select_D`, q.`select_answer`, q.`judge_answer`, q.`gap_answer`, q.`short_answer`,k.`knowledge_name` as `knowledge_name` ,s.`specialty_name` as `specialty_name` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` q INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`knowledge` k ON q.`knowledge_id`=k.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`specialty` s ON q.`specialty_id`=s.`id` WHERE q.`id`=#{id}
SELECT `id` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` WHERE questions_type='选择题' and `section_id`=#{section_id} ORDER BY rand() limit #{countX};
SELECT `id` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` WHERE questions_type='判断题' and `section_id`=#{section_id} ORDER BY rand() limit #{countP};
SELECT `id` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` WHERE questions_type='填空题' and `section_id`=#{section_id} ORDER BY rand() limit #{countT};
SELECT `id` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` WHERE questions_type='简答题' and `section_id`=#{section_id} ORDER BY rand() limit #{countJ};

SELECT q.`knowledge_id`, k.`knowledge_name` as `knowledge_name`,COUNT(*) as `count` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` q INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`knowledge` k ON q.`knowledge_id`=k.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`specialty` s ON q.`specialty_id`=s.`id` WHERE q.`section_id`=#{section_id} GROUP BY q.`knowledge_id`

SELECT q.`specialty_id`,s.`specialty_name` as `specialty_name`,COUNT(*) as `count` FROM `smart_site`.`questions` q INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`knowledge` k ON q.`knowledge_id`=k.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`specialty` s ON q.`specialty_id`=s.`id` WHERE q.`section_id`=#{section_id} GROUP BY q.`specialty_id`
